page.title: 18HOBBIES
page.content:
Hobbies are favourite things for people to do in their spare time,such as collecting, making and watching and doing. Some people collect stamps, which is known as Philately, butterflies, coins or articles from magazines, antiques or even beer cans and bottle tops. Many ladies enjoy knitting, making jumpers, doing embroidery or even sewing for the house. Many make model aeroplanes or pottery or toys and do carpentry. Others don't like to stay in. Instead they like energetic hobbies like football, cricket, squash and tennis, golf and swimming. Then there is gardening, birdwatching,painting and photography and many, many more.
ROBERT CROFT age 10.
